description: Gorgeous buff boy Adam Watson came looking for a new experience, and after seeing his perfect has we had to give him it! We strung him up, spread his legs, tied his balls and started working on his ass with a dildo. But we decided we needed something more spectacular and exciting for him, that's when we spotted the chain in the corner. It was grabbed and passed to Sebastian who had it threaded up his arse in minutes. The noises Adam was making put smiles on the crews face as we watched that chain disappear link by link. I'm not sure a chain being pulled from his ass was the experience he was looking for, but I didn't hear him complaining.
title: Adam Watson & Sebastian Kane
